text: aur ye Qurâ€™an aisa nahi ke Allah (ki wahi)ke baghair (apne hee se)ghad liya gaya ho,balke ye to (un kitabo ki) tasdiq karne wala hai jo us ke qabl(nazil)ho chuki hai aur kitab (ahkaame zaru-riyya) ki tafsil bayan karne wala hai,is mein koi bath shak ki nahi ke rabbul aalameen ki taraf se hai
